attributes.action: hand over the former Prime Minister to International War Crimes Tribunal so that he can be tried to see if he has committed any war crimes against innocent civilian people in Iraq and Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Former Prime Minister is believed to be responsible for the many war crimes committed in Iraq and Afghanistan. A non-official court in Japan has already found him guilty of war crimes in Iraq. It is time now to hand him over to International War Crimes Tribunal. If he is innocent, he has nothing to worry about.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
